alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:36AM CST until January 09 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Along the Little Pigeon River through Pigeon Forge and Sevierville. * WHEN...Until 230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1131 AM EST, local law enforcement reported the Little Pigeon River is almost out of its banks in Pigeon Forge. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
